summary: Adds- 14 New Followers, including twinpanic's Olivia Wilde!,  new areas, a guard and prison system, a hidden weapon, a quest, a vendor who sells almost all items, and much much more
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/9985-1-1370134231.gif[/img]
[font=Tahoma][size=2]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/9985-2-1344305899.gif[/img]
﻿[font=Tahoma][size=2]
-Welcome to The Followers Training Hall, an under construction tower in
Skyrim. This new tower has become very popular and has gained the attention of many fearsome warriors. This Mod includes new warriors which can be recruited to become followers![/size][/font]

-Adds 14 New Followers
-New area (with a prison system)
-A hi[/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=2]dden weapon
-A new quest
-A vendor who sells almost all items
-And much much more
[/size][/font]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/9985-2-1344306315.gif[/img]
[font=Tahoma]
[/font][center][font=Tahoma][color=red][size=5]No files are required as of Version 2.0! [/size][/color][/font]
[list]
[/list][font=Tahoma][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/?](Only Required if using v1.9 or lower) Better Females by Bella[/url][/size][/font][list]
[font=Tahoma][size=2]Author- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2501668/?] BellaGai[/url] Recommended Files- Version 3, and No Shine[/size][/font][/list] [/center]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/9985-1-1370312523.gif[/img]
[font=Tahoma][size=2]
[/size][/font][center][font=Tahoma][size=2] ** Click the Download with Manager Button **

or

++Download Manually++

1. Copy Followers Training Hall.esp and Followers Training Hall.bsp to Skyrim Data Folder
2. Start your desired Launcher and place a check mark beside the esp[/size][/font][/center]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/9985-3-1344305946.gif[/img]

[center][font=Tahoma][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]UFO- Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url][/font][list]
[font=Tahoma][size=2]Author- [/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1265248/?]fLokii[/url][/size][/font][/list][/center]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/9985-1-1344305946.gif[/img]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/9985-1-1335926981.jpg[/img]
[font=Tahoma][size=2]
The Location is added to your map once you install the mod, but you still have to travel to the location so that you can fast travel to it *(It's Grayed Out)*[/size][/font]


[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/9985-1-1344306315.gif[/img]

[font=Tahoma][size=2]List of Followers
===============

Lucian
Commander
Olivia
Kaljik
Alastair
Guardian
Oqua
Odin
Katara
Marcus Markez
Lara FLux
Alice
Vendor
Corrupted Shade
[/size][/font]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/9985-1-1344305957.gif[/img]
[size=2]
[/size][center][size=2]The quest isn't starting up when you load your save[/size][/center][center][list]
[/list] [/center]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/9985-5-1344305946.gif[/img]

[center]-Fallout BSA Unpacker
-Creation Kit
-All the Mod Tutorials on YouTube[/center]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/9985-3-1344305899.gif[/img]

[center]Feedback and Endorsements are highly appreciated!!
Send me messages with all your questions, bug complaints,

wishes, and pretty much anything!!

[/center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/9985-4-1344305946.gif[/img]

[center]Mod- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6459/?] Olivia Wilde [/url]Character by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1978253/?] twinpanic [/url](doesn't need to be downloaded for this mod to work)
Mod-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/?] Better Females [/url]Author- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/?]BellaGai[/url]
-Special Thanks to Bethesda and to Everyone who created Skyrim and the Elder Scrolls Series
-I'll be putting names of Users down here who help me with almost any aspect of this mod!
-Thanks to LHammonds for the Read me Generator this file was based on. [/center]

[color=red][size=5][center] Attention!!!! Any modders that wish to have or suggest theirs or someone else's character to be in this mod can contact me! Thanks [/center][/size][/color]

files.name: Follower Training Hall v_2_0
files.changelogHtml:
Change Log v2.0

List of Followers
===============

Lucian
Commander
Olivia
Kaljik
Alastair
Guardian
Oqua
Odin
Katara
Marcus Markez
Lara FLux
Alice
Vendor
Corrupted Shade


Followers and NPC's
=================

*Better Females By Bella is no loger a required file (it's now built in)*

Changed Follower- Test's name and ID to Alice
Fixed the number of armors and letters in the all of the Scribes Inventories
Added Eat Dinner, and sleep packages to all Followers
Fixed it so Marcus now sleeps, instead of just standing there
Renamed DarkSewer Prison Faction
Changed the Guards Outfits
Changed the Males Guards weight (This makes them look like they work out)
Changed Lara's Idle marker from crossed arms to sitting on a ledge
Lucian's weight was increased from 30 to 100 (makes him look more built)
Lucian has a scar on his face now
Changed the Guards at the big door- Now they look bigger and have new armor, weapons, and a appearence
Changed Kaljik's voice and his face - Now he has hair, scars, and face/war paint
Changed Alice's Voice
Changed the Corrupted Shade's Voice
All Followers except for The Shade now


Followers Training Hall
=================

Added Tree Reach Ferns to entrence
Changed Prison Cell and Guards Area
Changed Guards sleeping area
Changed the Lighting
Removed Player Home and put it into a new cell
Removed the Jail area and put it into a new cell
Removed Guards sleeping area and put it into a new cell
Added and Changed the area where the Commander is (Now it is a cave that they are digging)
Added fire pits and guards warming hands to Arena
Changed lighting in the Followers Arena


Followers Training Hall Outside Enterence
==================================

Added torches above the original ones
Changed the light from default torch to outside torch (Made it brighter)
Added mammonth skulls and a rib cage near the enterence
Added new fire pits near the enterence and on the cliff above the enterence (They are big and bright!)

Scribe's House Outside
==================

Added trees and grass
Added a new way to get on to the porch
Added rails to the porch
Added 3 torches to the building
Added more crates
Added *Easter EGG* Strong Box under one of the trees
Changed the size of the fog beside the house
Added fishing area on the other side of the river
Added fisher man
Added a bridge, and moved some trees and planets a bit
Added a tent and bed


Scribe's House Inside
====================

Changed the room color a bit
Added and Changed up things in the house a bit


DarkSewer Prison
===============

Changed the intieror name from "DarkSewer Jail" to "DarkSewer Prison"
Changed the Lighting


*NEW-Cell* Jail
============

Moved Jail area from Followers Training Hall Cell to its own cell
Replaced all the walls with new ones that fit the new area
Remade the Jail to feel more real, except the old Jail area is almost the same it just has some new additions
Add New NPCs to the Jail

*NEW-Cell/Area* Rooms and Dinning Hall
====================

Changed the place where the guards sleep
Added bedrooms for the followers
Added a dinning table for all the followers to eat at

*NEW-Cell* Throne Room
==============
Adds a new cell where you can find a new follower!!!!!

*New-Cell/Area-Shrine Room*
====================
Adds a new cell with all of the Shrines in it


Easter Eggs
=========

Master Sword
It's Dangerous To Go Alone
Spriggan Matron Test



======================================================
Older Versions
===========================================================================


version 1.9 Beta Changes/Add-ons[/u]

[u]Followers Training Hall "Outside"
[list]
[*] Added torches beside the door, so you can find the door in the dark
[*]Fixed the holes in the rocks above, and on top of the entrance

[u]Followers Training Hall "Inside"[/u]
[*] Replaced Axe with one you can pickup
[*] Moved one of the Miners to new location beside the other Miner
[*] Added Random wood piles for a later add-on (I couldn't get it working for this version)
[*] Added a light to the candle on the desk in the room where the Commander is located
[*] Added and Fixed the inside entrance, now it's a cave, that actually fits the door!
[*] Added and Replaced objects in the Vendor's back room
[*] Added a room for the Vendor to sleep in
[*] Moved the guards position in front of the jail farther away
[*] Added a Note and Journal to the Player's Jail Cell for the New Quest "DarkSewer Jail"
[*] Replaced there the grate takes you in the hidden room, in the Player's Jail Cell
[*] Added Spider webs and sacks to the hidden room, in the Player's Jail Cell
[*] Added a sewer behind the grate in the hidden room, in the Player's Jail Cell
[*] Added blood decals in the hidden room, in the Player's Jail Cell
[*] Fixed the position of items in the Player's Jail Cell to hide the pulley for the secret door better
[*] Fixed the guard after you get out of jail to be easier to kill
[*] Added tankard on top of the fireplace in front of Odin
[*] Added a secret Player House to the Training Hall (Good luck finding it, there clues to its location somewhere?)
[*] Added Room bounds and Portals to increase performance
[*] Added pots and ferns to the walls of the big room (upstairs and downstairs)
[*] Fixed and Added rocks to the windy area, so you can no longer see into the "void"
[*] Added a torch near the outside of the Player's Jail Cell

[u]Followers and NPC's[/u]
[*] All Followers now have items in their inventory, like the clothes they are wearing, and
random items that match; what I think are a part of, their personality
[*] Added a key to the vendor (Good luck finding her chest!)

[u]Arena[/u]
[*] Fixed when you open the Huge Arena doors on the inside you no longer see into the "void"
[*] Fixed a hole in the wall (Upper left of the back wall)
[*] Deleted some of the areas seats to fit new entrance
[*] Added a new entrance way to get to the arena (Takes too long to get down, the new stairs are better)
[*] Deleted teleporters
[*] Added new guards, for the new entrance way
[*]Added another new entrance to the bottom of the arena (It's the staircase on the left)
[*] Added some new objects to make it seem more realistic
[*] Added some blood decals to sections of the arena

[u]*New Areas Added*[/u]
[*] DarkSewer Jail
[*] Some secret rooms, I can't say the names, it would ruin the excitement, and quest!
[*] Tones of items, monsters, and much more added to those areas, but I can't say, it would ruin the surprise!

*I couldn't remember all the changes and fixes i made, but this should be the majority of them*
[/list]

[img=left] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/9985-2-1344305946.gif [/img]




==================================================================


Version 1.0
==========
List of Followers
[*]Olivia Wilde- added v.1
[*]Lara FLux- added v.1
[*]Odin- added v.1
[*]Lucian- added v.1
[*]Corrupted Shade- added v.1
[*]Vendor- added v.1
[*]Commander- added v.1
[*]Katara- added v.1
[*]Kaljik- added v.1
[*]Alastair- added v.1

Current Version
v 1.0 Changes/Add-ons
[*]Followers Training Arena
[*]Merchant Counter- With Vendor!
[*]Followers Training Hall
[*]Complete Guard System with Prison

PLANS FOR FUTURE RELEASES^
[*]Tweaks
[*]More Followers
[*]Player Home add-o
